name: Equitable Judgment
description:
Normal Attack
(Prepare for 1 turn)
Deals 2 Hydro DMG. If character has at least 6 HP, then deal 1 Piercing DMG to yourself and gain +1 DMG.
descriptionraw: <color=#D3BC8E>Normal Attack</color>\n(Prepare for 1 turn)\nDeals 2 {SPRITE_PRESET#2102}<color=#80C0FFFF>Hydro DMG</color>. If character has at least 6 HP, then deal 1 Piercing DMG to yourself and gain +1 DMG.
